CNG technology is readily available without extensive development time or expenditure of resources. Fiat already has a portfolio of CNG engines, both naturally aspirated and turbocharged. Chrysler Powertrain is actively investigating applications for CNG and is exploring solutions that would drive people to the technology. An election dispute between Laurent Gbagbo and rival Alassane Ouattara is slowly turning Ivory Coat's political crisis into an economic disaster-- and the mood on the streets is sour. There's no more business. No one even has any money to fix their cars anymore, said 70-year-old Abidjan mechanic Lamine Sylla, gloomily surveying his yard of rusty old wrecks.`` We're in serious difficulty.
